sentences.sContent: This man was too injured to dissimulate well.
sentences.sCn: 这个男人伤得太重，不可能掩盖得住。

sentences.sContent: He didn't attempt to dissimulate or conceal his true feelings.
sentences.sCn: 他没有尝试着掩饰或隐瞒自己的感受。

remMethod.val: dis(不) + simul(相同) + ate → 不和本来面目相同 → 掩盖， 掩饰

trans.tranCn: 掩盖， 掩饰， 假装
trans.tranOther: When people dissimulate, they hide their true feelings, intentions, or nature
